mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM video_parent_ics WHERE 1=1
AND enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterpriseName},'%') AND area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.areaName},'%')

SELECT * FROM video_parent_ics WHERE 1=1
AND enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterpriseName},'%') AND area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.areaName},'%') order by id desc limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}
